text: Ayula iyohuma, nitsomtenda yawe ngutso mne ing'anda ye Imulungu wangu, ng'atsolawa hamwo bae. Pfipfila mna yeye nitsokwandika taghwa lye Imulungu wangu na taghwa lya ghumji ghwe Imulungu wangu, iyo Yerusalemu ya sambi, ghutsohulumka kulawa kulanga kwa Imulungu wangu. Pfipfila mchanya mwake nitsokwandika taghwa lyangu lya sambi.
